original_title: Puede Ako, Puwede Ka Pa Ba
overview: Official entry to the first Metro Manila Film Festival in 1976 directed by Elwood Perez & Joey Gosiengfiao and starred Amalia Fuentes, Romeo Vasquez, Eddie Gutierrez, Vivian Velez, Rosemarie Gil, Ike Lozada, Inday Badiday, Cloyd Robinson, Lilian Laing, and Sandy Garcia.
title: Puede Ako, Puwede Ka Pa Ba
